message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor. It's a good start, and we can adjust later if needed.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is more fair, considering the inflation rates will benefit me more than you. Let's see if you agree.

Okay, I understand the inflation advantage is working in your favor. I'm willing to compromise a little further and offer a 55/45 split. This feels like a more equitable compromise considering the changing value of the money.
